name: Classic Bounce Game
description:
♥ Hey! If you enjoy the game consider donating, I'm a solo dev so every bit helps! ♥

Welcome To Classic Bounce! 

This is only a demo about 5 levels in length. The game is still being worked on and is in an early stage of development. Some things might change.

Classic Bounce is a platformer 2D game inspired from the famous game "Bounce" but in a more retro graphical way!

Please, leave your feedback in the comments. Let's play and walkthrough videos are also appreciated! If you encounter a bug, feel free to also leave a comment or to PM me on Discord / Twitter.

FAQ

  • What are the Controls?

Arrows Keys and WASD.

  • On what platforms?

For now only on pc! I'm considering posting it on mobile but no promises.
